name: Zealot
description: First it should be a Single Player only level. Then I decided to include a Deathmatcharea. And now the Deathmatcharea is better then the Single Player Part! My betatesters said also that it is'nt that good as Single Player - so you maybe want to use this as DM only Level. The Deathmatcharea contains a separate exit, different weapons etc. So give it a try!
